record.description: Kenneth Paul Sanow, winner of a second prize for $300 in a National Tax Equality Association essay contest. A jury of college faculty members awarded Sanow, a University of Chicago student, the prize for his essay analyzing cooperative corporations' tax exemptions. First prize of $750 went to Miss Lila Fundaburk of Luverne, Alabama.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Includes insert from the National Tax Equality Association.
